body.p: I have Known Mr Pursley since his marriage, and take pleasure in bearing testimony to his good character and Conduct.

His father in law is one of the most respectable & prominent Citizens in the County, and I think (without kno that judging from his behavior & general character since he has lived in this County, that the public interest would not suffer if the Indictment against Mr P. in the Christian Circuit Court were dismissed.
